instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.
instructions.2: Combine seasoning dressing mix with bread crumbs in a gallon-size Glad® Food Storage Bag.
instructions.3: Add chicken pieces and seal bag. Shake the bag to evenly coat chicken.
instructions.4: Bake chicken on ungreased baking pan at 375 degrees F for 50 minutes or until juices run clear or an internal temperature of 165 degrees F.

questions.question: In Step 4, is the chicken from Step 3 being used?
Is chicken from Step 3 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is oven from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
Is seasoning dressing mix live after Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
If we skip Step 3, is it still valid to bake the chicken in Step 4?
Can we add (Step 3) and bake (Step 4) at the same time?
